dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Zhenis Kassymbek, the akim of Astana, just gave an update on that new light rail transit system.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Zhenis Kassymbek, the akim of Astana, just gave an update on that new light rail transit system.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Astana's akim (governor) Zhenis Kassymbek responded to a question about the possible cost of a single LRT ride.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Oh right, the LRT—I was wondering when we'd get some concrete numbers on the fares.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh right, the L R T-I was wondering when we'd get some concrete numbers on the fares.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, he mentioned it at a public meeting in the Saraishyk district, actually. Said they haven't pinned down an exact price yet.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, he mentioned it at a public meeting in the Saraishyk district, actually. Said they haven't pinned down an exact price yet.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: During a public meeting with residents of the Saraishyk district, the akim stated that the exact fare for the LRT has not yet been determined.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: But he did give a range, didn't he? Something like 100 to 200 tenge per ride?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: But he did give a range, didn't he? Something like one hundred to two hundred tenge per ride?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Preliminary pricing was in the range of 100 to 200 tenge, and for now, that's where it stands, Zhenis Kassymbek said.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly, that's the preliminary estimate. So, you know, pretty affordable for public transit, I'd say.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly, that's the preliminary estimate. So, you know, pretty affordable for public transit, I'd say.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: And when's this thing supposed to be up and running again?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And when's this thing supposed to be up and running again?

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Uh, construction's set to wrap up summer of 2025, so not too far off.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Uh, construction's set to wrap up summer of twenty twenty five, so not too far off.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Earlier, Kassymbek announced that construction work on the LRT will be fully completed in the summer of 2025.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Nice. Were there any other topics brought up at that meeting?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Nice. Were there any other topics brought up at that meeting?

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Oh yeah, lots—street lighting, landscaping, public transport accessibility... all that community stuff.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh yeah, lots-street lighting, landscaping, public transport accessibility... all that community stuff.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Other issues discussed during the meeting with residents included courtyard and public space improvements, street lighting, landscaping, public transport accessibility, and the development of social infrastructure.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Makes sense. You gotta think about the whole experience, not just the train itself.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Makes sense. You gotta think about the whole experience, not just the train itself.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: For sure. I'm curious though—do you think they'll stick to that 100-200 tenge range, or will it creep up?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: For sure. I'm curious though-do you think they'll stick to that one hundred to two hundred tenge range, or will it creep up?

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Hard to say. Inflation and all, but hopefully they keep it accessible. It's such a needed service.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Hard to say. Inflation and all, but hopefully they keep it accessible. It's such a needed service.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Absolutely. And with a 2025 completion, it feels like it's actually within reach now.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Absolutely. And with a twenty twenty five completion, it feels like it's actually within reach now.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, finally! I'm looking forward to taking that first ride.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, finally! I'm looking forward to taking that first ride.
